official_title: To temporarily reduce the column 2 rate of duty on certain paper cutting machines.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, on or before December 31, 1992, the column two rate of duty on paper cutting machines for making up paper pulp, paper, or paperboard.

titles.title: To temporarily reduce the column 2 rate of duty on certain paper cutting machines.
